metadata.name: Neon one
metadata.description:
We see a light emitting female doing a modern dance pose in a tunnel of neon colored light tubes.
A high contrast and futuristic artwork which can be used as a digital web3 image but would also look great on an interior wall.
Modern art where dance, color and neon have a leading role resulting in an futuristic and abstract image.
In my work I love to work with dancers as they can create amazing shapes, lines and expressions as you can see here.
